lenders.name: Jason Kendall
lenders.loan_because:
As a UNIX admin who supports global foreign currency exchange trading, I am part of the Evil Global Empire.  So, I figure I have to mitigate part of my time in the seventh circle with an occasional good deed.  However, we all know how such spiritual payola goes, so I guess it is just a generally good thing to do.  And now that it CAN be done with ease, why not support it?  I mean, for $50, I could take out my wife to eat at a relatively good Manhattan restaurant, or do this.  All works to be the same I guess.  The money I would spend at the restaurant helps the Mexican immigrants who do the dishes to send remittances back to Chiapas or wherever.  But this just seems a little more direct.  In all, it is an interesting way to be a filla... philo... philly...  good-deed-doer.

Second, I used to work on the 104th Floor of the World Trade Center, and was a few minutes late that day.  The picture on this page was from my desk in that office.  What the developing world needs is responsible financial support to give hope to people and counteract the destructive influence of hyper-radical Islam.  Funding a farmer, cobbler, tailor, or cook helps make a real life for real people.      

They are just asking for a shot at dignity and independence.

Give them a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers all day long.  I help with global finance by making those computing systems work better.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: I still believe its better 2 give then 2 receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Paint, draw and be good to your surroundings.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I empower individuals to choose and decide based on their heart and soul.

---- Google translation ----

---- Google translation ----

I noticed that the web pages that meet missing in one place tourist information on regions of my country, mainly in video (also tv). Then created a Web page where each company will have its own page with the right to 5 sections: videos, gallery, text information, comments and contact form. For that I am available 1 videographer, 1 journalist and 1 graphic design. Lack only equipment for filming (camera).

Mama told me when I was young Come sit beside me, my only son And listen closely to what I say. And if you do this It will help you some sunny day. Be something you love and understand.

I greatly appreciate that KIVA was established to truly help those in financial need that have no other viable means to survive or get ahead in life. 

Everyone deserves an opportunity to get ahead in life if they are willing to do the work.  Especially those who have significantly fewer resources and opportunities available to them.

There is nothing more rewarding in life than "Paying It Forward"! AV

lenders.loan_because: Kammy asked me to!  And gave me a credit for my first loan.  I can't wait to see how this works out!  Hi to Zenobia in Bolivia!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I live in Florida.  I am married and have three children.  I work writing proposals for governments and NGOs.

lenders.loan_because: I don't have much and I don't earn much but I'd like to think that the little help that I give out makes a big difference.  That's why since  I have more time than money, I also try to participate in http://freerice.com
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a flight attendant who works in the plane for customer service on board as well as making sure of the safety of our passengers.  I have seen both beautiful and sad places in my line of work which inspired me to try to help out as much as I can with the preservation of culturally rich but economically deprived countries.

lenders.occupational_info: I want to be a doctor.

lenders.occupational_info: I am in second grade. I like soccer and basketball. I want to be an engineer and build cars and planes.

lenders.name: Smith Family
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to be successful.  Kiva is the best way for us to help people all over the world to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build well-designed, efficient and enjoyable communities.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: People are created in the image of God.  When you see people in that image, the sufferings of poverty are no longer tolerable.

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the "good" in people;
I am a Christisn, trying to make the world a better place, one person at a time-for my Grandchildren's world.
lenders.occupational_info: I assisted U.S. citizens to have a better life.......

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.And especially to those who need a little support,only an opportunity to change their lives so they can lead a more secure,dignified and self-reliant life.Being involved in finance, I understand how the rich have easy access to capital,but the odds are stacked against poorer people who truly need loans to improve their circumstances.Plus I respect those who are looking for a small break and not asking for a handout.Kiva's micro-finance concept helps us all to contribute in transforming some lives, which in turn helps build better and happier communities,therefore leading to a more desirable world.Because of the personal aspect ,I am also able to empower women who face greater social and economic challenges.
lenders.occupational_info: I mentor and guide people to achieve their goals of financial security via acquisitions of income producing property. So I understand the importance of helping people get loans to improve their lives.Kiva  provides a micro-financing platform to help make a difference in those people's lives who need a loan the most, and yet have the hardest time getting it.

lenders.name: Miguel Fernando
lenders.loan_because: Aportar al desarrollo del pais, mediante las expresiones artisticas. propiciando de esta manera visiones de un futuro mejor para los necesitados
lenders.occupational_info: dibujos, talleres, conferencias, seminarios, que permitan la participacion de jovenes

lenders.name: Eliana
lenders.loan_because:
I care, it feels good to help others and I have been blessed with everything I have in my life. 

I was given some money to make 4 (my favorite number) loans as a gift from my better half, Marc, for Valentine's Day. We both would like to help people in need instead of buying each other useless Valentine gifts. ;O)

lenders.name: winpuppy
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Burns!
lenders.loan_because:
I like the (almost) direct contact of choosing a specific entrepreneur , and the ability to follow-up to see exactly where the money goes and how it helps.

I'm not just donating money to some giant faceless charity that may use the funds to help someone, or maybe to purchase more ads to generate more donations, or maybe to pay some overpaid CEO.  The money that I loan goes directly to an actual person and makes specific impact.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help entrepreneurs in developing nations, particularly women, support their families and a more sustainable livelihood. I have plenty to share. This is a sustainable program, not just a donation, and I like the person-to-person contact made possible by the internet.
lenders.occupational_info: I convene conferences and retreats for entrepreneurs in the sustainability change movement to help them collaborate and spend their time and money effectively. I also design and deliver leadership capacity building programs. If someone wants to get better at any aspect of leadership, such as team building, working collaboratively, and developing a vision and getting others on board, I can help them do that.

lenders.name: Vicki Snyder
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women should help other women become independent so that they can take care of themselves.  It's also my way of sending love to women all over the world from America.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a buyer for a large corporation.  Now I travel, garden, and look for ways to help women in other parts of the world to promote love, peace independence and respect

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: 1) kiva is a non-profit; 2) it helps other people improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites. And it's fun :)

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: We have been self employed most of our lives. We respect people who believe in themselves enough to be entrepeneurs and we want to help them succeed.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: My son got me started by setting this up as a birthday gift.  I think it is a wonderful way to help those that really need it to get started or build their business.  It is great that I can make it a perpetual gift.

lenders.name: Rachel & Steve
lenders.loan_because: We want to help someone else be able to live the life they want and provide for their families. We all deserve to be able to live well and care for our families especially those willing and able to work.
lenders.occupational_info: We love to read, create items for friends and family, and we love volunteering in our community. We travel a bit as a  family , and we like to camp and hike. We're  on a mission to live the best lives we can.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: it's my duty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Tennessee in Knoxville, TN, and I am currently studying to be a civil engineer.

lenders.name: Fern
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my grand-daughter how important it is to help others.  And I also want to make the world she grows up in, a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a new grandmother. My granddaughter has so much and I want to teach her that it is important to help others.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: access to finance shouldn't just be for the rich but for anyone who wants to work hard and make their business a sucess.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the Deputy Director of Green Alliance - an organisation that campaigns for ambitious solutions to climate change and other global environmental issues.

lenders.name: Chie

I know that most people prefer independence over charity, so if I can help a family start a business through Kiva, they can succeed and help others as well.

lenders.name: Loren
lenders.loan_because: As a Baha'i, (http://www.bahai.us) I am firmly to committed to helping out those who are less fortunate. Loaning with Kiva is a way for me to pool my limited resources with the resources of others to make a big difference in the lives of those who are struggling to get ahead in life. It is one small way for me to collaborate with others who want to eliminate extreme poverty, and bring the world together. Everyone can do something to make a difference! The more we work together in unity, the bigger the change we can affect, and the better conditions will become for all members of our human family.
lenders.occupational_info: Presently, I am teaching English to non-native speakers, on the island of Sakhalin, in the Russian Far-East. I am passionate about my work because it empowers my students to take advantage of global economic opportunities that might otherwise be denied them.

lenders.occupational_info: i repair electronic engines and i rent out musical instrument like speakers and engine.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping someone to help themselves is the best way of helping.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because:
I like being able to see a connection with the people I loan money to.  Living in Tokyo, I am blessed with a good job and many opportunities.  It is a privilege to be able to loan any amount of money or time and I am happy to have the chance to do so.

Entrepreneurship creates jobs and is the best development tool for any economy.  Even in Japan, the government is turning to entrepreneurship.

Ultimately I think that Kiva could really unleash a lot more power by allowing people in developing countries to loan small amounts to other people in other developing or developed countries.  I think that this would really empower people by breaking the concept that they are not successful and need to get loans.  

Entrepreneurs everywhere have cash management issues.  This is where Kiva can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Ecocert SA and manage their Japanese subsidiary. We are an organic certification company.  Organic certification gives many farmers in developing areas a chance to get a higher price for their crops.  This leads to them putting more money into their community.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I really loved the story of Grameen and the idea of microlending.

lenders.occupational_info: We sell properties and developments in South Africa, especially along the Garden Route in SA
